DataElement.preferredName: AIDS Malignancy Consortium Patient Exclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria 048 Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type of element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trials cooperative group supported by NCI.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: AIDS Malignancy Consortium Patient Exclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trials cooperative group supported by the NCI.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Exclusion; the act of restricting entrance or barring from participation.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: 048 Exclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of clinical trial eligibility exclusion criteria for an AIDS Malignancy Consortium 048 protocol.

PermissibleValues.value: If the participant is female, is she pregnant or breast-feeding
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: If the participant is female, is she pregnant or breast-feeding

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: If the participant is female, is she pregnant or breast-feeding

PermissibleValues.value: Has the participant received previous therapy for BL or atypical BL other than seven consecutive days of steroids
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Has the participant received previous therapy for BL or atypical BL other than seven consecutive days of steroids

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Has the participant received previous therapy for BL or atypical BL other than seven consecutive days of steroids
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Has the participant received previous therapy for BL or atypical BL other than seven consecutive days of steroids

PermissibleValues.value: Does the participant have any medical illness unrelated to NHL, which in the opinion of the attending physician and Principal Investigator (PI), will preclude administration of chemotherapy safely
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the participant have any medical illness unrelated to NHL, which in the opinion of the attending physician and Principal Investigator (PI), will preclude administration of chemotherapy safely

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the participant have any medical illness unrelated to NHL, which in the opinion of the attending physician and Principal Investigator (PI), will preclude administration of chemotherapy safely
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the participant have any medical illness unrelated to NHL, which in the opinion of the attending physician and Principal Investigator (PI), will preclude administration of chemotherapy safely

PermissibleValues.value: Does the participant have a history of any malignancy for which the disease-free interval is <5 years, excluding curatively treated cutaneous basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma and carcinoma in situ of the cervix or cutaneous KS
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the participant have a history of any malignancy for which the disease-free interval is <5 years, excluding curatively treated cutaneous basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma and carcinoma in situ of the cervix or cutaneous KS

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the participant have a history of any malignancy for which the disease-free interval is <5 years, excluding curatively treated cutaneous basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma and carcinoma in situ of the cervix or cutaneous KS

PermissibleValues.value: Is the participant already receiving erythropoietin or G-CSF for treatment of HIV-related cytopenia
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the participant already receiving erythropoietin or G-CSF for treatment of HIV-related cytopenia

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the participant already receiving erythropoietin or G-CSF for treatment of HIV-related cytopenia
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the participant already receiving erythropoietin or G-CSF for treatment of HIV-related cytopenia
